title: Pre-season friendly announced
body: Kinmel Bay Mens FC is proud to confirm a pre-season friendly versus Rhyl at the Community Centre, Eirias Park. Kick-off 2pm. Come down, cheer the lads and enjoy the day!

title: New signing confirmed
body: We’re delighted to announce E. Thomas has joined KBFC. He brings pace, finishing and experience to the forward line.

title: Training times updated
body: Please arrive 15 mins early, bring both boots and trainers. New players welcome!
